title: Loading Screen doesnt comes after champ select
body: dont u guys think so after we select champ and loading screen doesnt pops up its not our fault but technical pbm and what does riot do, it gives us leavebuster, basically if we are lvl one in whole match then they should end  the match or remake and also how can i uninstall this new alpha client?

replies.body:
Being absent from a match, regardless of intent, negatively impacts *everyone in the match*. This is actually a huge reason why disconnections are all treated equally by the system and why we are unable to remove penalties associated with the Leaverbuster system. You can find more on the system in our [**Leaverbuster FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

To uninstall the Beta Client, you'll have to complete a clean reinstall of the entire League client using [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends). Let me know if you have any questions.
